control.name: Define the purpose of the data processing
control.desc:
The purpose of the application must be formally documented. This purpose serves as the input for different controls as the processing purpose must be legitimated and all used data fields can only be used if it can be shown that they are required for the documented purpose.

The purpose should also be used in order to document the functional requirements of the application. Functional requirements should be limited to the documented purpose.

test.steps: Verify documentation exists detailing the purpose for all user personal data requested within the application user interface.
